item.description:
Join us for a Boston Atheists pub night this coming Monday, 5/21/12, at 6:30 PM at the Uno's in Kenmore Square.

BA member Tanya Walker, head of the State Chapter of the National Atheist Party, suggested that we treat this dinner as an opportunity to do a little fundraising for Camp Quest New England. This July 20 - 22nd, CQNE will be running their first-ever summer camp session on the Connecticut College campus, New London. I'd love for us to raise a few hundred dollars to help offset the costs to campers -- and then let the other area groups know that we've set the bar for them to stump up with their support as well. More information about the Camp can be found at http://campquestnewengland.org.
item.name: Pub Night / Fundraising Dinner for Camp Quest New England
